location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Diagrammatic sketch map of the Iraqi-Kuwait border area

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing paperDimensions:330 x 201 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn rough sketch map of the area southwest of Safwan in Iraq, enclosed with a report of Kuwait-Iraq Frontier Incidents dated 29th September 1936 (folios 108-119). Shows the location of camps with number of tents and dates reported. Includes references to cases of smuggling which are described in the report.Another copy of the map can be found on folio 86.
